issue.title: [CI] [GLib] Disable GTK-Doc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5306](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5306). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Travis fails to process documents by GTK-Doc.
 <https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/531197944#L4170>
 This caused by the recent GTK-Doc upgrade to 1.30. So disable GTK-Doc until 1.31 is released.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5306?focusedCommentId=16838858) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4299
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4299>
